      • setCapacitanceIntercept

        public void setCapacitanceIntercept(double capacitance_intercept)
        Capacitance intercept parameter. Units are pF. Capacitance is calculated as: C = capacitance_intercept + strip_length * capacitance slope
        Overrides:
        setCapacitanceIntercept in class SiStrips
        Parameters:
        capacitance_intercept -

      • setCapacitanceSlope

        public void setCapacitanceSlope(double capacitance_slope)
        Capacitance per unit strip length. Units are pF / mm.
        Overrides:
        setCapacitanceSlope in class SiStrips
        Parameters:
        capacitance_slope -

      • getCapacitance

        public double getCapacitance()
        Nominal capacitance used for throwing random noise in the sensor. Calculated using middle strip. Units are pF.
        Specified by:
        getCapacitance in interface SiSensorElectrodes
        Overrides:
        getCapacitance in class SiStrips
        Returns:
        the nominal capacitance used for noise generation in the sensor (pF)
